title: Celebration Mysore half Marathon & 10K
details: <span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;PT Sans Narrow&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 22.8571px; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; display: inline !important; float: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Life is Calling Sports welcomes you to the 6th edition of Celebration Mysore 1/2 Marathon and 10K run. The event is scheduled on a Sunday early morning so that the runners and their families get to soak the culture and heritage of Mysore over a weekend and participate in the fun filled running events.</span>

title: Apply now Developer 100 Mysore
details: <div>Three destinations, one hundred developers, five specialties. The Developer 100 tour is a fact! Are you ready for a more challenging career?</div><div><br></div><div>Do you recognize yourself in this profile:</div><div><br></div><div>“My brain never stops creating new idea’s. I’m always ready for a challenge and my curiosity reaches beyond my area of expertise. I don’t wait for work, I see or create my own opportunities. I’m confident enough to pitch my idea’s to the company and love to stand out from the crowd.”</div><div><br></div><div>When you read this text and thought: YES, that’s me! Than you could have what it takes to become part of the Developer 100. Send in your resume and who knows? Maybe you are the one to get an invite to our “Special Interview day” in Mysore. We are hiring for our offices in Bangalore and Gurgaon.</div><div><br></div><div>Read more about the Developer 100 or sign up via the website! Make sure you sign up as the day is invite only!</div>
